moves.name: Stored Power
moves.effect: The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the power of this move.

moves.name: Psychic Terrain
moves.effect: Turns the field into Psychic Terrain.

moves.name: You Snooze, You Lose!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Defense, Sp. Atk, and Sp. Def. Sharply raises these stats if the field is Psychic Terrain.

moves.name: Psychic
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of lowering the target’s Sp. Def.

syncMove.name: Truth-Seeking Future Sight
syncMove.description: The more the target’s Sp. Def has been lowered, the greater the power of this move.

passives.name: On a Roll 4
passives.description: Raises the chance of lowering stat values with the additional effects of moves.
